dct_title_s: Accra & Ghana south : Cape Coast, Kumasi
dct_description_sm: Relief on Ghana map shown by contours, gradient tints, and spot heights. Panel title. Accra map representative fraction shows 1:23,000, while Accra map bar scale shows 1:24,000. "© ITMB Publishing." Includes indexes, text. Inset maps: Accra centre, at scale 1:15,000 -- Cape Coast, at scale 1:50,000 -- Kumasi, at scale 1:60,000.
